title: Windows 7 AIO 26in1 SP1 x86 en-US IE11 USB3 Mar2014
description:
murphy78 presents Windows 7 AIO 26in1 SP1 x86 en-US
Contains KBfile hotfixes current to Mar11-2014 patch date

No Windows 7 Settings were harmed in the making of this ISO.
No Programs are added to Windows.
No Unattended Settings were added to the installation.
No Registry Settings were modified.

OOBE.cmd phase:
If OEM-Activated index, will load custom graphics logos and backgrounds
based on the motherboard manufacturer of your system. If Intel it will
load intel graphics. You get the idea. It also attempts to set the OEM
activation.

SetupComplete.cmd phase:
KB2533552 (online-only update)
Winloader and reboot if Activated index.

Features:
-Internet Explorer 11
-USB3 drivers for major manufacturers for both boot and install index.
-Network and WLAN drivers for most manufacturers added.
-Default/Pre-Activated/KMS-Activated indexes; choose your flavor
-DaRT7 recovery-mode options integrated into boot setup.

*Intructions*
1- Get this torrent
2- Get the x86 AIO Baseline v2 torrent if you don't already have
3- Run the patch exe file and point it at the x86 baseline v2 folder
4- Enjoy your monthly .ISO and keep your baseline ISO for next month

Notes: Newer torrent programs will flag the Windows Loader as a hacktool.
If you don't know how to deal with false positives, don't waste either
of our time; get something else.

Changes:
-I moved NetFx 4.5.1 redist back to the ISO folder Net451. I'm
of the opinion that everyone should install it, but I'm not going to
force everyone to install it that doesn't want to.
-Added a vbs script to enable Microsoft Update version of Windows Update.
Script is essentially the same as the activex version that the "Find out more"
button runs in wuapp.exe from your IE browser. I added the script because
sometimes the IE method fails. Script is in the ISO scripts folder.
